name: Nam Khao Tod (Thai Crispy Rice Salad Recipe)
description: Nam khao tod - Thai crispy rice balls tossed with fresh herbs and spices, perfect for an appetizer or a light dinner.
recipeIngredient: 1.75 ounce pork skin (cooked and finely sliced)

itemListElement.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine steamed rice, minced pork, white sugar, fish sauce, red curry paste, and kaffir lime leaves.
itemListElement.name: In a large mixing bowl, combine steamed rice, minced pork, white sugar, fish sauce, red curry paste, and kaffir lime leaves.

itemListElement.text: Gently knead using your hand, making sure all ingredients are well mixed.
itemListElement.name: Gently knead using your hand, making sure all ingredients are well mixed.

itemListElement.text: Once the rice mixture is kneaded, form it into round balls by hand.
itemListElement.name: Once the rice mixture is kneaded, form it into round balls by hand.

itemListElement.text: Start by cracking an egg into a bowl, add water, and whisk it until it’s well beaten.
itemListElement.name: Start by cracking an egg into a bowl, add water, and whisk it until it’s well beaten.

itemListElement.text: Roll a formed rice ball in the tempura flour to coat it evenly.
itemListElement.name: Roll a formed rice ball in the tempura flour to coat it evenly.

itemListElement.text: Next, dip the flour-coated rice ball into the beaten egg until it’s completely covered.
itemListElement.name: Next, dip the flour-coated rice ball into the beaten egg until it’s completely covered.

itemListElement.text: Roll the egg-dipped rice ball in the tempura flour again for a second coat.
itemListElement.name: Roll the egg-dipped rice ball in the tempura flour again for a second coat.

itemListElement.text: Deep-fry the double-coated rice balls in hot oil until they are golden brown and crispy.
itemListElement.name: Deep-fry the double-coated rice balls in hot oil until they are golden brown and crispy.

itemListElement.text: After frying, place the crispy rice balls on a wire rack to drain any excess oil.
itemListElement.name: After frying, place the crispy rice balls on a wire rack to drain any excess oil.

itemListElement.text: In a mixing bowl, break down the fried rice balls into chunks.
itemListElement.name: In a mixing bowl, break down the fried rice balls into chunks.

itemListElement.text: Combine the fried rice with fermented pork sausage, pork skin, chili flakes, fish sauce, lime, and MSG.
itemListElement.name: Combine the fried rice with fermented pork sausage, pork skin, chili flakes, fish sauce, lime, and MSG.

itemListElement.text: Finish by tossing the rice mixture with fresh herbs like coriander and green onions, add ginger, shallots, fried peanuts, and fried chilies. Thoroughly combine and serve immediately.
